AquaINFRA Handbooks

This handbook provides a video-based training resource designed to help users understand and apply AquaINFRA services and tools through guided demonstrations. It introduces the AquaINFRA infrastructure architecture, explains its core components and their interactions within the broader digital research ecosystem, and presents applied use cases showing how AquaINFRA enables aquatic research communities to manage and reuse data effectively in alignment with FAIR principles and the European Open Science Cloud (EOSC).

1

European Open Science Cloud (EOSC)

Understand how AquaINFRA integrates with the European Open Science Cloud infrastructure.

EOSC in Handbook →
2

Introduction to AquaINFRA

Core mission and goals of the AquaINFRA project and the broader ecosystem.

AquaINFRA in Handbook → Project Website →
3

AquaINFRA Interaction Platform (AIP)

Discover the Aqua Interaction Platform.

AIP in Handbook → AIP Homepage →
4

Virtual Research Environment (VRE)

Utilize the Virtual Research Environment for seamless analysis execution.

5

Data to Knowledge Package

Converting raw environmental data into actionable knowledge indicators.
